content: You are Ludovico. Tommaso just unsuccessfully completed an action 'pickup_for_storage' regarding 'source_stock_insufficient' that involved you. What is your immediate, brief, and natural reaction or comment TO Tommaso? Keep it short and conversational.
"Ah, Tommaso! Source stock ran dry, eh? Bit of a bother, isn’t it? We'll sort it out."
